name: crop
description: Copy and crop images using Lambda

scripts.deploy: aws cloudformation deploy --template-file packaged-template.yml --capabilities CAPABILITY_IAM --stack-name dev-crop-$USER --parameter-overrides sourceBucket=$SOURCE_BUCKET destBucket=$DEST_BUCKET width=$WIDTH height=$HEIGHT xCoordinate=$X yCoordinate=$Y

author: Evan Chiu <evan@evanchiu.com>
